profile.name: Hi, i'm Sebastián.
profile.description: My main focus is reflected in the dedication that I have in satisfying the required needs.
profile.description2: I have a strong disposition to acquire knowledge about new technologies and methodologies, constantly looking for growth opportunities both professionally and personally.
profile.description3: I have basic knowledge in different technologies, and I am complementing my studies with courses on Udemy while i finish my degree.
profile.info2: Python or Java. In addition, I am willing to work in languages that I do not know, with the aim of learning and acquiring new knowledge.
profile.info3: I'm interested in learning about the Full Stack or Backend area

cv.title: Experience
cv.experience_description_1:
Preventive and corrective maintenance in different areas.
Great Train Maintenance (GR) specifically in the pneumatic area.
cv.experience_description_2:
Standardization of processes and procedures.
Start of 5S Kaizen, for future implementation.
cv.experience_description_3:
Preventive and corrective maintenance of different areas, pneumatic specialty.
Supervise work and compliance with company rules and regulations, and task delegation.

courses.title: Courses
courses.course_title_1: Python sin límites. POO, Tkinter, PySide, etc. +50hrs
courses.course_title_2: Universidad Desarrollo Web - FrontEnd Web Developer!

project1.title: APP Inglés
project1.info1: Own project, created with html, css and javascript to learn and practice the basic functionalities of these languages, and reinforce English.
project1.info2: The project is a web application created using different technologies. Its main objective is to provide a tool to improve and practice knowledge of English, focusing on learning verbs in different conjugations.

project2.title: Shopping Cart
project2.info1: Institute project, developed as part of the Front-End course using HTML, CSS and JS with LocalStorage.
project2.info2: A functional shopping cart application has been developed using LocalStorage. In addition, the understanding of key concepts in web development and the importance of an interactive and user-friendly interface have been strengthened.

project3.title: Appointment management
project3.info1: Institute project, developed as part of the Back-End course using HTML, CSS, Django and PostreSQL upload to Render.
project3.info2: A functional automotive appointment management application has been developed. With two interfaces (Customer and Receptionist) where you can manage vehicles and manage maintenance appointments.
